				}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
loadDocType="{{@@body@data-doctype}}";
loadType="{{@@body@data-randomtype}}";
sid=baseUrl.match(/(\d+).html/)[1];
url=baseUrl.replace(/\d+.html/,'')

var section = {
    loadDocType: loadDocType,
    loadType: loadType,
    sid:sid,
    content: {
        childNode: [],
        
        init: function(c){
            this.body=c
            if (section.loadType == 'normal') {
      this.load(String(java.base64Decode(java.getString('//*[@name="client"]/@content'))))
            } else if (section.loadType == 'substep') {
                var d = 'r' + section.sid;
                var f = false;
                if (section.loadDocType == 'xml') {
                    d += '.xml'
                } else if (section.loadDocType == 'json') {
                    d += '.json';
                    f = true
                } else {
                    return false
                };        
             cookie="PHPSESSID="+java.get(baseUrl,{}).cookie("PHPSESSID");
            token= java.get(url+d,{"X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest","referer":baseUrl,"cookie":String(cookie)}).header("token")                
                	this.load(token)      	
            } else {
                return false
            };               
        },
        load: function(a) {         
            a = String(java.base64Decode(a)).split(/[A-Z]+%/);      
            var b = 0,
            start = 0;
            for (var i = 0; i < this.body.length; i++) {
                if (String(this.body[i]).match(/h2/i)) {
                    start = i + 1
                };
                if (String(this.body[i]).match(/div/i)&& this.body[i].attr("class") != 'chapter') {
                    break
                }
            };
          
            for (var i = 0; i < a.length; i++) {
                if (a[i] < 5) {
                    this.childNode[a[i]] = this.body[i + start];
                      b++
                } else {
                    this.childNode[a[i] - b] = this.body[i + start]                 
                }
            };
  }
}
}
section.content.init(java.getElement("@@id.content@children!0").toArray());
section.content.childNode.join("")
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'77800','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请换源或稍后访问~"}
</js>

更新日志请点击登录，更新书源中查看

兼容正式版阅读app
exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    var open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument, '') || {};
    open_argument[key] = value;
    var result = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(result);
    return result;
}

var open_argument = source.getVariable();
var base_url = getArguments(open_argument, 'server') || '';
var ms = getArguments(open_argument, 'tone_id') || '';
var source_type = getArguments(open_argument, 'source_type') || '男频';
var tab = getArguments(open_argument, 'media') || '小说';
var sources = getArguments(open_argument, 'source') || '番茄';


var sdtoken;
try {
    var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
    sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['手动填写番茄token(可不填)'] || '');
} catch (e) {
    sdtoken = '';
}

var rawCookie = getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken;
var match = rawCookie.match(/sessionid=[^;]+/);
var fqcookie = match ? match[0] : '';
var fqssionid = '';
if (!fqcookie) {
    java.toast('您还未登陆番茄账号，无法同步数据哦！');
} else {
    fqssionid = getSessionId(fqcookie)
}
var fqsjurl = base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;
var fqtjurl = base_url + "/fqrecommend?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;
var fqlsurl = base_url + "/fqhistory?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;

var groupDatas = [];
var infoData = [];

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

var hasValidCookie = fqcookie.length > 0;

if (hasValidCookie) {
    function groupQuery() {
        try {
            var url = base_url + "/group_name?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
            var res = java.ajax(url);
            var response = JSON.parse(res);

            if (!(response && response.data)) {}

            response.data.forEach(function(group) {
                var keys = Object.keys(group);
                if (keys.length > 0) {
                    var key = keys[0];
                    var value = group[key];
                    if (value && value.length) {
                        var option = {
                            "method": "POST",
                            "body": {
                                "book_ids": value,
                                "page": "{{page}}"
                            }
                        };
                        groupDatas.push({
                            title: key,
                            url: base_url + "/bookshelf," + JSON.stringify(option),
                            style: {
                                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            });

            if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    title: "--",
                    url: "",
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        } catch (e) {
            java.longToast("番茄登录过期，已隐藏番茄书架");
        }
    }

    try {
        java.longToast("正在加载分组数据...");
        var userUrl = base_url + "/fquser?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
        var userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
        var userData = JSON.parse(userRes);

        var userName = (userData && userData.data && userData.data.name) ? userData.data.name : '未知用户';
        if (!userName.includes('未知用户')) {
            infoData = [{
                title: "番茄个人中心",
                url: fqsjurl,
                style: {
                    layout_flexGrow: 1,
                    layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                }
            }, {
                title: "个性推荐(番茄)",
                url: fqtjurl,
                style: {
                    layout_flexGrow: 1,
                    layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                }
            }, {
                title: "历史阅读(番茄)",
                url: fqlsurl,
                style: {
                    layout_flexGrow: 1,
                    layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                }
            }];
        }
        groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
        java.longToast("番茄登录过期，已隐藏番茄书架");
    }
}

var style_list = [];
try {
    var durl = `${base_url}/discovestyle?source=${sources}&source_type=${source_type}&tab=${tab}`;
    var res = java.ajax(durl);
    var result = JSON.parse(res);
    style_list = result.data || [];
    if (result.msg) {
        java.toast(result.msg);
    }
} catch (e) {
    java.toast("发现样式获取失败");
}
let qtcookie = cookie.getCookie(base_url);
let qtop = {
    method: "GET",
    headers: {
        cookie: qtcookie
    },
};
qtop = JSON.stringify(qtop);
let qtsjurl = base_url+'/get_book_shelf,'+qtop
let qtsj = [{
                title: "大灰狼个人中心",
                url: qtsjurl,
                style: {
                    layout_flexGrow: 1,
                    layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                }
            }]
var finalData = infoData.concat(groupDatas, style_list);
finalData = qtsj.concat(finalData);
JSON.stringify(finalData);
</js>

if (String(baseUrl).startsWith("data:")) {
    let res = JSON.parse(java.hexDecodeToString(result));
    let book_id = res.book_id;
    let tab = res.tab;
    let sources = res.sources;
    let url = res.url;
    let html = "";
    let proxy = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "proxy");
    if (url != "" && proxy == "本地") {
        if (sources == '69书吧') {
            let ck69 = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
            let headers = {
                "Cookie": ck69
            };
            let op = JSON.stringify({

ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
let {
    book_id,
    source: sources,
    tab,
    book_tts,
    tags,
    role,
    last_chapter_title,
    last_chapter_update_time,
    word_number,
    status,
    score,
    abstract,
    copyright_info
} = result;
let proxy = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "proxy");
if (proxy == "本地") {
    proxy = "本地网络";
} else {
    proxy = "服务器网络";
}
java.put("book_detail", JSON.stringify(result));
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "server");
let key = "";
try {
    let cookieValue =
        String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
    key = getKey(cookieValue);
} catch (e) {
    key = "";
}

if (key == "") {
    java.log("当前服务器未查询到登录状态，尝试查询其他服务器登录状态...");
    let cookieValue;
    for (let h of host) {
        try {
            cookieValue = String(cookie.getCookie(h)) || String(java.getCookie(h));
            key = getKey(cookieValue);
        } catch (e) {
            key = "";
        }
        if (key) {
            java.log(`已在${h}登录，退出查询，正在转移登录状态到当前服务${base_url}`);
            //java.log(cookieValue)
            removeCookie(h);
            removeCookie(base_url);
            cookie.setCookie(base_url, cookieValue);
            break;
        }
    }
}

if (book.readConfig == null || book.readConfig.useReplaceRule == null) {
    book.setUseReplaceRule(false);
}

let nickname = '账号状态：⚠️ 未登录 | 点击右上角 🔖 登录';
try {
    let opcx = {
        method: "GET",
        headers: {
            cookie: 'qttoken=' + key + ';'
        },
    };
    opcx = JSON.stringify(opcx);
    let user_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(base_url + '/get_avatar,' + opcx));
    if (user_info.code == 0) {
        if (user_info.nickname) {
            nickname = '欢迎回来：' + user_info.nickname
        } else {
            nickname = '欢迎回来：' + user_info.email + "(请前往用户后台设置用户名)"
        }
    }
} catch (e) {
    if (key) {
        nickname = '账号状态：已登录'
    }
};

let loginStatus = nickname;

let lightDivider = "❇️───────❇️───────❇️";
let heavyDivider = "‎\n‎";

let isValid = (value) => String(value).length > 1;
let ctitle = book.durChapterTitle || '未开始';
let info = `
    📡 当前服务：${base_url}
    🔑 ${loginStatus}
    🏷 数据来源：${sources}
    🔄 当前模式：${tab}
    ⚙️ 访问模式：${proxy}
    📖 阅读至：${ctitle}
`;

if (tab == "听书") {
    let toneId = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "tone_id");
    if (isValid(book_tts)) {
        info += `${lightDivider}
    🎵 音色配置：${toneId}
    ${book_tts}
`;
    }
}

let basicInfo = "";
let addBasicInfo = (value, prefix, icon) => {
    if (isValid(value)) basicInfo += `    ${icon} ${prefix} ${value}\n`;
};

addBasicInfo(tags, "书籍分类：", "🌈");
addBasicInfo(role, "书籍主角：", "👑");
addBasicInfo(last_chapter_title, "最新章节：", "📚");
addBasicInfo(last_chapter_update_time, "更新时间：", "⏳");
addBasicInfo(word_number, "书籍字数：", "📊");
addBasicInfo(status, "书籍状态：", "🚩");
addBasicInfo(score, "书籍评分：", "⭐");

if (basicInfo) info += `${lightDivider}\n${basicInfo}`;

if (isValid(abstract)) {
    let indentedAbstract = abstract
        .split("\n")
        .map((line) => `    ${line}`)
        .join("\n");
    info += `${heavyDivider}
    📖 书籍简介：
${indentedAbstract}
`;
} else {
    info += `${heavyDivider}`;
}

if (isValid(copyright_info)) {
    info += `${lightDivider}
    © ${copyright_info}
`;
} else {
    info += `${lightDivider}`;
}

info += `
${heavyDivider}
    💠💠💠 数据更新于 ${new Date().toLocaleString()} 💠💠💠
`;
let jjinfo = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "info");

if (jjinfo != "on") {
    info = String(info)
        .split("\n")
        .map((line) => line.replace(/^ {4}/, ""))
        .join("\n");
} else {
    basicInfo = "";
    addBasicInfo(last_chapter_title, "最新章节：", "📚");
    addBasicInfo(last_chapter_update_time, "更新时间：", "⏳");
    addBasicInfo(word_number, "书籍字数：", "📊");
    addBasicInfo(status, "书籍状态：", "🚩");
    addBasicInfo(score, "书籍评分：", "⭐");
    if (isValid(abstract)) {
        let indentedAbstract = abstract
            .split("\n")
            .map((line) => `    ${line}`)
            .join("\n");
        basicInfo += `
    \n‎
    📖 书籍简介：
${indentedAbstract}
`;
    } else {
        basicInfo += `${heavyDivider}`;
    }
    info = `‎\n🏷 数据来源：${sources}\n` + basicInfo;
}
</js>

            "Cookie": ck69

        });
        java.log(op);

        //java.log(html);
    }
};
let content = "";
let data;

    device_type = "苹果";
} catch (e) {
    try {
        device = java.androidId();
        device_type = "安卓";
    } catch (e) {
        device = "";
        device_type = "安卓";
    }
}

try {
    qtcookie = `qttoken=${String(cookie.getKey(base_url, "qttoken"))}; deviceId=${device};`
} catch (e) {}

var params = {

};

var content_url = '/content';

if ((sources == "番茄" || sources == "七猫" || sources == "塔读") && getArguments(source.getVariable(), "fqpara") == "on" && tab == "小说") {
    content_url = '/content?review=1';
}

var op = {

        cookie: qtcookie,
        'Content-Type': 'application/json'
    }
};

op = JSON.stringify(op);

    data = JSON.parse(data);

        java.toast(data.msg);
    }
} catch (e) {}

content = data.content

if ((sources == "番茄" || sources == "七猫" || sources == "塔读") && getArguments(source.getVariable(), "fqpara") == "on" && tab == "小说") {
    var fqssionid = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "fqssionid") || "";
    content = content
        .replace(/ident="/g, 'ident="' + base_url)
        .replace(/book_id=/g, 'book_id=' + book_id + '&ssionid=' + fqssionid);
    if (device_type == "苹果") {
        content = paraForiOS(content, sources);
    } else {
        content = paraForAndroid(content, sources);
    }


}
data = JSON.stringify({

});

if (device_type == "安卓" && (tab == "短剧" || tab == "视频" || sources == '毒舌影视')) {

            video_url = content;
        };
        java.startBrowser(video_url, title);
        java.toast("正在加载视频...");
    }

}
data;

        res.body
        .replace("source", "sources")
        .split("&")
        .map((query) => query.split("="))
    );

}

if (url != "" && proxy == "本地") {
    if (sources == '69书吧') {
        let ck69 = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
        let headers = {
            "Cookie": ck69
        };
        let op = JSON.stringify({
            "headers": headers
        });
        html = java.ajax(url + ',' + op);
    } else {
        html = java.ajax(url);
    }
    //java.log(html);
    if (html.includes("Just a moment...") && sources == '69书吧') {
        cookie.removeCookie(url);
        var x = `https://www.69shuba.com`;
        java.longToast('需要真人验证，请进入任意书籍详情页过验证');
        var s = java.startBrowserAwait(x, "需要真人验证，请进入任意书籍详情页过验证").body();

        let ck69 = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
        let headers = {
            "Cookie": ck69
        };
        let op = JSON.stringify({
            "headers": headers
        });
        //java.log(op);
        html = java.ajax(url + ',' + op);
        //java.log(html);
    }
};
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "server");
let op = {
    method: "POST",
    body: {
        html: html
    }
};
op = JSON.stringify(op);
let varia = String(book.getVariable('custom'));
if (varia == 'null') {
    varia = '';
}
varia = JSON.stringify({
    'custom': varia
});
// varia = java.base64Encode(varia);
//java.log(`${base_url}/catalog?book_id=${book_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&variable=${varia},${op}`);
let data = java.ajax(
    `${base_url}/catalog?book_id=${book_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&variable=${varia},${op}`
);
let device, device_type;
try {
    device = java.deviceID();
    device_type = "苹果";
} catch (e) {
    try {
        device = java.androidId();
        device_type = "安卓";
    } catch (e) {
        device = "";
        device_type = "安卓";
    }
}

if (tab == "小说") {
    if (device_type == "安卓") {
        book.type = 8;
    } else {
        book.type = 0;
    }
} else if (tab == "听书") {
    if (device_type == "安卓") {
        book.type = 32;
    } else {
        book.type = 1;
    }
} else if (tab == "漫画") {
    if (device_type == "安卓") {
        book.type = 64;
    } else {
        book.type = 2;
    }
} else if (tab == "短剧") {
    if (device_type == "安卓") {
        book.type = 8;
    } else {
        book.type = 3;
    }
} else {
    if (device_type == "安卓") {
        book.type = 8;
    } else {
        book.type = 0;
    }
}
let qtcookie = cookie.getCookie(base_url);
let reading = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "reading");

if (book && book.order != 0 && reading == '1') {
    try {
        if (!data || !book.variable || !base_url || !qtcookie) {
            java.log('缺少必要参数');
        } else {
            let parsedData;
            try {
                parsedData = JSON.parse(data);
            } catch (e) {
                java.log('解析data数据失败:' + e);
            }
            
            if (parsedData && parsedData.data && Array.isArray(parsedData.data) && parsedData.data[book.durChapterIndex]) {
                let ritem = parsedData.data[book.durChapterIndex];
                let bookInfoObj;
                try {
                    bookInfoObj = JSON.parse(book.variable);
                } catch (e) {
                    java.log('解析book.variable失败:' + e);
                }
                
                if (bookInfoObj) {
                    let book_info;
                    try {
                        book_info = JSON.parse(bookInfoObj.book_detail || JSON.stringify(bookInfoObj));
                    } catch (e) {
                        java.log('解析book_detail失败:' + e);
                    }
                    
                    if (book_info && typeof book_info === 'object') {
                        let rurl = base_url + '/add_book_to_book_shelf,';
                        book_info['read_status'] = 1;
                        book_info['last_chapter_item_id'] = ritem.item_id || '';
                        book_info['last_chapter_title'] = ritem.title || '';
                        let rop = {
                            method: "POST",
                            headers: {
                                cookie: qtcookie
                            },
                            body: book_info
                        };
                        let check_book_url = base_url + '/check_book_in_book_shelf,';
                        let checkResponse;
                        
                        try {
                            checkResponse = java.ajax(check_book_url + JSON.stringify(rop));
                        } catch (e) {
                            java.log('检查书籍请求失败:' + e);
                        }
                        
                        if (checkResponse) {
                            let check_data;
                            try {
                                check_data = JSON.parse(checkResponse).data;
                            } catch (e) {
                                java.log('解析检查响应失败:' + e);
                            }
                            try {
                                if (check_data && check_data.id) {
                                    book_info['id'] = check_data.id;
                                    let uurl = base_url + '/update_book_shelf,';
                                    java.ajax(uurl + JSON.stringify(rop));
                                } else {
                                    java.ajax(rurl + JSON.stringify(rop));
                                }
                            } catch (e) {
                                java.log('书架操作失败:' + e);
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    } catch (error) {
        java.log('书籍同步流程异常:' + error);
        java.longToast('\n同步阅读进度失败，但不影响阅读，可以前往登录关闭书架同步功能。');
    }
}
data;
</js>$.data

searchUrl:
<js>
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), 'server');
let media;
let sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(), 'source');
let disabled_sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(), 'disabled_sources');
if (String(key).startsWith("m:") || String(key).startsWith("m：")) {
    media = "漫画"
    key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("t:") || String(key).startsWith("t：")) {
    media = "听书"
    key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("d:") || String(key).startsWith("d：")) {
    media = "短剧"
    key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("x:") || String(key).startsWith("x：")) {
    media = "小说"
    key = key.slice(2)
} else {
    media = getArguments(source.getVariable(), 'media');
}
if (key.includes('@')) {
    var parts = key.split('@');
    key = parts[0];
    sources = parts[1] || sources;
}
let qtcookie = cookie.getCookie(base_url);
let op = {
    method: "GET",
    headers: {
        cookie: qtcookie
    },
};
op = JSON.stringify(op);
`${base_url}/search?title=${key}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&page={{page}}&disabled_sources=${disabled_sources},${op}`
</js>

250203新增七猫来源
250204新增得间来源
250204新增QQ来源(仅支持免费小说)
250204新增熊猫看书
250210更新日志：
1.采用全新验证方式，之后未填写密钥，可以在阅读页登陆后刷新阅读页面即可！
2.搜索默认改为全局搜索，目前仅支持番茄，七猫，QQ，得间，熊猫，后面的按钮是预设，后期会添加相关来源
3.新增大灰狼书架功能，在登陆里面点击书架查看

下个版本预计更新内容：
1.预计发现页新增阅读记录和大灰狼书架栏目
2.预计新增阅读记录，阅读过的书籍可在大灰狼书架-阅读历史中查看
3.预计新增塔读小说，米读小说，小米阅读，猫眼看书，部分起点

ruleSearch.lastChapter:
<js>
function fq_last() {
	let url = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id={{$.book_id}}`;
        let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]; 
        return last["last_chapter_title"]+" · "+java.timeFormat(last["last_chapter_update_time"]*1000);
	
	}

	
function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};
let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))["data"]["book"];
let last2 =  `${last["latest_chapter_title"]} · ${java.timeFormat(last['update_time']*1000)} `
	return last2
	}
	//如果要显示最新章节，请去除注释，去除会影响搜索速度
//if ('{{$.source}}'=='番茄'){
//	'番茄:'+fq_last();
//	} else if ('{{$.source}}'=='七猫'){
//	'七猫:'+qm_last();
//	} else {
	'{{$.source}} {{$.last_chapter_title}}'
//		}

</js>
